sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_af9f93832f331010c5d33f96f699b681
sys_update_xml.payload: custom c.data.num_pages || pag < 1) return; c.data.p = pag; c.data.action = 'refreshData'; c.server.update().then(function(){ c.data.action = ''; }); } /* Update the list */ c.update = function update(index) { c.showPagination = false; c.data.action = 'refreshData'; c.data.p = 1; c.data.searchFilters = []; for(var f in c.data.fields){ var key = c.data.fields[f]; var record = {}; record.field = key; record.type = c.data.column_types[key]; record.value = c.modelFields[key]; c.data.searchFilters.push(record); } c.server.update().then(function(){ c.showPagination = true; c.data.action = ''; }); }; }]]>c/*------- SEARCH BOX -------*/ .search{ margin-right: 10px; overflow: auto; } .search__icon{ float: right; padding: 7.2px 12px; border: 1px solid #E5E5E5; border-radius: 0px 6px 6px 0px; border-left: none; } .search__input{ float: right; border: 1px solid #E5E5E5; border-radius: 6px 0px 0px 6px; padding-left: 12px; width: 250px; height: 30px; border-right: none; margin-right: -3px; } /*------- END -------*/ /*------- PANEL -------*/ .panel{ margin: 10px; background: white; border-radius: 6px; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: 'Helvetica'; } /*Head*/ .panel-heading{ border: 1px solid #E5E5E5; border-bottom: 0px; } .title{ margin: 5px; font-size: 26px; } .title__icon{ margin-right: 15px; } .title__button{ float: right; font-size: 21px; } /*Body*/ .panel-body{ margin: 0px; padding: 0px; } /*Footer*/ .panel-footer{ border: 1px solid #E5E5E5; border-top: 0px; background: white; padding: 0px; /*pagination*/ .pagination{ margin: 8px 15px; display: inline; } .page-item a{ color: black; } .current{ color: white!important; background-color: #424141; } .num_pages{ background-color: white; color: black; } .num_pages:hover{ background-color: white; color: black; } nav{ padding: 5px; overflow: auto; } /*goTo*/ .goTo__input{ height: 34px; border: 1px solid #ddd; border-radius: 3px; width: 60px; } .goTo__button{ padding: 7px; border-radius: 3px; border: 1px solid; } } /*------- END -------*/ /*------- LIST -------*/ .list{ table{ border: 1px solid #E5E5E5; border-radius: 6px; border-collapse: collapse; width: 100%; } th{ border: 1px solid #E5E5E5; padding: 8px 10px; text-transform:capitalize; cursor: pointer; } td{ border: 1px solid #E5E5E5; padding: 5px 10px; } } .list__short--label{ max-width: 300px; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; display:inline-block; } .list__exp{ display: -webkit-flex; display: flex; -webkit-align-items: center; align-items: center; -webkit-justify-content: center; justify-content: center; } .list__exp--label{ font-weight: 550; margin-right: 10px; } .exp_buttons{ button{ margin: 5px; } } /*Columns*/ .search_field{ border: 1px solid #c7c7c7; border-radius: 6px; width: 100%; padding-left: 10px; } .date_time{ input{ border: 1px solid #c7c7c7; border-radius: 6px; padding: 0px; padding-left: 10px; height: 24px; } button{ padding: 1.4px 8px; border: 1px solid #c7c7c7; border-radius: 6px; } } /*Others*/ .hide{ display: none; } .close_icon{ font-size: 20px; float: right; } /*------- END -------*/ /*------- LOADING -------*/ .loading{ border: 1px solid #E5E5E5; text-align: center; } .loading__icon{ font-size: 35px; -webkit-animation: spin 2s linear infinite; animation: spin 2s linear infinite; margin-top: 20px; } .loading__p{ font-size: 21px; font-family: 'Helvetica'; margin-top: 8px; } @-webkit-keyframes spin { 0% { -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg); } 100% { -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); } } @keyframes spin { 0% { transform: rotate(0deg); } 100% { transform: rotate(360deg); } } /*------- END -------*/ /*------- NOT FOUND -------*/ .not_found{ padding-bottom: 25px; padding-top: 25px; border: 1px solid #E5E5E5; text-align: center; } .not_found__icon{ font-size: 50px; margin-bottom: 10px; } .not_found__p{ font-size: 19px; } /*------- END -------*/ sp_instance_tabletitle,table,field_list,maximum_entriesfalseocl__expandable_list_plusfalseOCL: Expandable list Plus[{"name":"icon_class","section":"other","default_value":"","label":"Icon full class - like: \"fa fa-flag\"","type":"string"},{"name":"all_fields","section":"other","label":"All Fields","type":"string"},{"name":"filter","section":"other","label":"Filter","type":"string"}]falsefalsesp_widgetadmin2020-10-16 17:03:50af9f93832f331010c5d33f96f699b681550OCL: Expandable list Plusglobalglobalsp_widget_af9f93832f331010c5d33f96f699b681admin2020-10-23 17:50:47

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_9c8a487c2f086010c5d33f96f699b686
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.listUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>listUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var listUtils = Class.create();
listUtils.prototype = {
	
	/**SNDOC
	@name initialize
    @description Constructor method of listUtils
    @param {String} [table] - ServiceNow Table
    @param {array} [fields]  fields of the choose table
    @example
	
	var field_arr = ['number','assigned_to','short_description'];
    var list = new listUtils('incident',field_arr);
	*/
	
	initialize: function(table, fields) {
		this.t = table;
		this.f = fields;
		this.strangeFields = ['short_description','description','title','name'];
		this.column_types = {};
	},

	/**SNDOC
	@name getColumns
    @description Get the columns data of the choose table 
    @returns {array} Array containing the columns data
    @example
	
    var list = new listUtils('incident',field_arr);
	var columns = list.getColumns();
	
	//Output:
    [
	 {
		choices [{label: "New", value: "1"},{label: "In Progress", value: "2"},{label: "Canceled", value: "8"}],
		label: "State",
		name: "state",
		type: "_choice"
	 },
	 {
		choices [],
		label: "Number",
		name: "number",
		type: "string"
	 }
	]
	*/
	getColumns: function(){
		if(!this.t || !this.f){
			return;
		}
		
		var columns = [];
		var grCol = new GlideRecord(this.t);
		grCol.newRecord();
		
		for(var i in this.f){
			var element = grCol.getElement(this.f[i]);
			var column_obj = {
				label: grCol[this.f[i]].getLabel(),
				name: this.f[i],
				type: element.getED().getInternalType()
			};
			var choiceList =  GlideChoiceList.getChoiceList(this.t, this.f[i]);
			if(choiceList.getSize() > 1 && this.strangeFields.indexOf(column_obj.name) == -1){
				var options = [];
				for (var i=0; i < choiceList.getSize(); i++) {
					options.push({'value': choiceList.getChoice(i).getValue(), 'label': choiceList.getChoice(i).getLabel()});
				}
				column_obj.type = '_choice';
				column_obj.choices = options;
			}
			else{
				column_obj.choices = [];
			}
			this.column_types[column_obj.name] = column_obj.type;
			columns.push(column_obj);
		}
		return columns;
	},
	
	/**SNDOC
	@name getColumnType
    @description Get an object with the columns type 
    @returns {object} Object containing the columns type
    @example
	
	//you need run the getColumns function first, else you'll recive an empty object
	var list = new listUtils('incident',field_arr);
	var columns_type = list.getColumnType();
	
	//Output:
		{number: "string", short_description: "string", state: "_choice", sys_updated_on: "glide_date_time", assigned_to: "reference"}
	*/
	getColumnType: function(){
		return this.column_types;
	},
	
	/**SNDOC
	@name getRows
    @description Get an array with the list data 
	@param {GlideRecord} [gr] - GlideRecord 
    @returns {Array} Array containing all rows
    @example
	
	var list = new listUtils('incident',field_arr);
	var rows = list.getRows();
	
	//Output:
	[
		{display: "INC0000060", sys_id: "1c741bd70b2322007518478d83673af3"},
		{display: "David Loo", sys_id: "1c741bd70b2322007518478d83673af3"},
		{display: "Closed", sys_id: "1c741bd70b2322007518478d83673af3"},
		{display: "Unable to connect to email", sys_id: "1c741bd70b2322007518478d83673af3"},
		{display: "2016-12-13 18:46:44", sys_id: "1c741bd70b2322007518478d83673af3"}
	]
	*/
	getRows: function(gr){
		if(!gr){
			return;
		}
		
		var arr_col = [], list = [];
		
		while(gr.next()){

			for(var i=0; i < this.f.length; i++){
				var fld = this.f[i];
				var obj = {};
				if (!gr[fld].canRead()) {
					obj.display = null;
					obj.sys_id = null;
				}
				else {
					obj.display = gr.getDisplayValue(this.f[i]) || ' ... ' ;
					obj.sys_id = gr.getValue('sys_id');
					/* use it to make a ng-switch, like ng-switch-when="state"
					type: data.fields[i]  */ 
				};
				arr_col.push(obj);
			}
			list.push(arr_col);
			arr_col = [];
		}
		return list;
	},
	
	/**SNDOC
	@name createPagination
    @description Get an object with the pagination data 
	@param {Integer} [maximum_entries] - Number of rows per page
	@param {Integer} [page] - Index of actual page
    @returns {object} Object containing the pagination data
    @example
	
	// you need to run the getColumns function first, else you'll receive an empty object
	var list = new listUtils('incident',field_arr);
	var pagination = list.createPagination(10,1);
	
	//Output:
	{window_end: 10, window_size: 10, window_start: 0}
	
	*/
	createPagination: function(maximum_entries, page){
		var p, page_index, window_size; 
		p = parseInt(page) || 1;
		page_index = p - 1;
		window_size = parseInt(maximum_entries) || 10;

		if (isNaN(window_size) || window_size < 1)
			window_size = 20;

		var data = {};
		data.window_size = window_size;
		data.window_start  = (page_index * window_size);
		data.window_end = (((page_index + 1) * window_size));

		return data;
	},

	type: 'listUtils'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-10-21 12:03:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>9c8a487c2f086010c5d33f96f699b686</sys_id><sys_mod_count>75</sys_mod_count><sys_name>listUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9c8a487c2f086010c5d33f96f699b686</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-10-23 17:49:19</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
